text:
Sakuya, good job.
The talk event was really lively.

Yeah, it ended so quickly, didn't it?
I wish we could have talked longer.

We'll make another opportunity.
Next time, we'll make sure to have plenty of time.

That makes me happy.
I'm looking forward to it.

Producer, what do you think? Instead of taking
the car back to the hotel, walking might be nice.

It's fine... But Sakuya, aren't you tired?
You can rest more comfortably in the car────

No, I'm not tired.
I just feel like we haven't talked enough yet...

While we walk, could you please
indulge me a little longer?
